name: Ascot cap
description: a hard men's cap similar to the flat cap, but distinguished by its hardness and rounded shape.

name: Beaver Hat
description: a hat made from felted beaver fur.

name: Boater
description: a kind of men's formal summer hat.

name: Busby
description: a military head-dress made of fur, originally worn by Hungarian hussars.

name: Coonskin cap
description: a hat fashioned from the skin and fur of a raccoon.

name: Deerstalker
description: The deerstalker's main feature is a pair of fore and aft brims and two flexible side flaps.

name: Fedora
description: a felt hat originally designed for a woman but is now most commonly worn by men.
